page.title: 14SUPERNATURAL HELL'S POOL
page.content: Magor Church is an interesting place to visit.On the south side,facing the moor,there are big,strong buttresses,and on the northern side they are not so strong.This is because when the church was built,people were very superstitious and believed that there was a devil in a nearby pond on the moor. They thought the devil would suck the church into the pool,this is one reason why the pool is called "Hell's Pool." It first got it's name of "Hell's Pool" when Redwick Church had a new bell,they had to cross the moor with the bell,and as they were crossing,the cart got caught in the bog making the bell fall into the pool,they blamed this on the devil.Local people say that on a cold,misty morning,if you hear the bell,you will have bad luck.
